CustomField.description: Three types of status, "Assigned", "In Progress", or "Completed" are available to represent the status of a user's badge. While we always expect a value, this is not a required field to enable FLS for badge assigners.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tres tipos de estado, "Assigned", "In Progress" o "Completed" est√°n disponibles para representar el estado de una insignia de usuario.
CustomField.label: Status
